backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor for challenge management, including types, storage mixins, authorization, assignment mappings, and build metadata.
feature_evidence.json: Lists features, related files, components, and test IDs for audio upload removal and recorder usability requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in navigation, state management, i18n, styling, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Re-exports the main stylesheet by importing the authoritative theme token CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with cache-busting meta tags and injected build version.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth state, challenge status, URL-synced navigation, update detection, and gated flows.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the layout wrapper with a centered mobile-style container and suppresses the migration banner.
frontend/src/components/AppUpdatingNotic: Shows a blocking loading notice when the app detects a version mismatch and refreshes.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders multiline assignment text with bold step headers while preserving line breaks.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Implements in‑app audio recording, review, and save workflow without exposing upload‑from‑file controls.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout states with translated labels.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Icon-only button that triggers Internet Identity login/logout and clears cached data on logout.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically redeems persisted invitation codes when eligible and shows loading/error states during the process.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Full chat interface with message posting, editing, replies, participant name resolution, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Popup dialog informing the user that a challenge was deleted and allowing dismissal.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Displays a referenced message preview with sender name resolution for chat replies.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer debugging panel showing auth state and enabling query refresh; not enabled by default.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Provides two info popups with translated content for social contemplation and challenge details.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Empty placeholder file for a language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders a list of popup sections with optional headings and formatted content.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Gate that requires users to complete their profile name before accessing the app, showing a form when missing.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Wrapper that displays loading or error states for a query before rendering its children with fetched data.
frontend/src/components/RecordingFeedbac: Empty placeholder file for recording feedback functionality.
frontend/src/components/RecordingLevelMe: Renders a visual audio level meter with color-coded bar based on normalized level value.
Implements an audio player with play/pause, seek slider, and time display using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/components/RecordingWavefor: Empty placeholder file for a waveform component.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Provides a reusable dialog wrapper with consistent layout, scrolling, and trigger behavior using shadcn UI components.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes using a custom theme hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppUpdateGuard.ts: Checks app version on startup and triggers a one-time hard refresh if mismatched, preventing refresh loops.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecording.ts: Manages microphone recording with live audio level analysis, timers, and cleanup, returning recording state and controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Exposes authentication state and principal string derived from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, challenges, recordings, and chat messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useSuppressMigrationB: React hook that observes DOM mutations and hides elements containing a specific migration banner message.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with localStorage persistence and applies the theme to the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the user's challenge status using react-query, enabled only when authentication and actor availability conditions are met.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Provides a translation context with a simple key‑based lookup and forces English/LTR document settings.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines the full English translation dictionary for the app, including UI text for multiple screens.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up react‑query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
Displays the no‑challenge state with refresh, navigation to challenge creation, and translated UI text.
Implements challenge creation and management UI, including codes, participants, start time, and various mutations.
Shows a placeholder manage‑challenge screen with state info, edit navigation, and info popups.
Main challenge screen handling tabs, day selection, participant views, audio recording upload/delete, and challenge-not-found recovery.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Landing menu that decides whether to login, create a challenge, or enter an active one based on auth and user status.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Reads, writes, and clears navigation-related URL parameters without reloading the page.
frontend/src/utils/appVersion.ts: Extracts and validates the frontend app version from meta tags or fetched HTML, rejecting placeholders.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed 7‑day challenge assignment list with canonical IDs and updated content.
frontend/src/utils/backendBuildInfo.ts: Caches backend build info and exposes helpers to store, retrieve, clear, and format a short build identifier.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears the active challenge ID in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats a challenge day number into a human-readable weekday and date based on start time.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Persists a flag in sessionStorage indicating that a challenge was deleted and should show a notice.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all client-side challenge state by clearing storage, URL state, and invalidating related React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/hardRefresh.ts: Provides a loop-protected, cache‑busted hard refresh and a helper to clear the protection flag.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates random uppercase invitation codes using an unambiguous character set.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, clears, and persists invitation link params using URL and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts and validates UI day values and backend day values between 1–7 and 0–6.
Logs upload attempts, failures, and successes with minimal diagnostic context.
frontend/src/utils/recordingIds.ts: Defines canonical recording assignment IDs and helpers to validate, assert, and normalize them.
Extracts, classifies, and sanitizes error messages into safe user‑facing text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Reads, stores, persists, and clears URL parameters from query strings and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/versionCheck.ts: Fetches the latest app HTML to compare versions and determine if a refresh is needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions for colors, radii, shadows, animations, and includes typography, container query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing audio upload removal, recorder improvements, assignment name updates, and pending feature requests with architectural notes and known issues.
